original_text: Then Pharaoh commanded all his people, “Every son that is born to the Hebrews you shall cast into the Nile, but you shall let every daughter live.”
korean_text: 그러므로 바로가 그의 모든 백성에게 명령하여 이르되 아들이 태어나거든 너희는 그를 나일 강에 던지고 딸이거든 살려두라 하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh commanded all his people,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바로가 자기 백성 모두에게 명령하여,

sentences.original_text: Every son that is born to the Hebrews
you shall cast into the Nile,
but you shall let every daughter live.”
